function down_groups(urls)
  for i = eachindex(urls)
    if (mod(i, ncluster) != cluster)
      continue
    end
    url = urls[i]

    try
      @time nc_subset(url, range; outdir="./OUTPUT/ChinaHW")
    catch ex
      @show ex
    end
  end
end


for d = lst
  # println(d)
  println(nrow(d))
  urls = d.file
  
  try
    down_groups(urls)
  catch e
    @show e
  end
end
